mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY nick_name DESC
mapper.insert: insert into user (first_name, last_name, nick_name, email, pass_word) values (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{passWord})
mapper.select: select sp.* from user inner join sys_user_role sur on user.id = sur.user_id inner join sys_role_permission srp on sur.role_id = srp.role_id inner join sys_permission sp on srp.perm_id = sp.id where user.email = #{value};
